Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Occasional missense mutations in ATM were also found in tumour DNA from patients with B - cell non - Hodgkins lymphomas ( B - NHL ) and a B - NHL cell line .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| B-cell non-Hodgkins lymphomas (B-NHL) |
| a B-NHL cell line |

In the given paragraph, the two disease entities are:

1. B-cell non-Hodgkins lymphomas (B-NHL)
2. a B-NHL cell line

These entities are mentioned as they are associated with occasional missense mutations in ATM found in tumour DNA.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| B-cell non-Hodgkins lymphomas (B-NHL) |

In the given paragraph, the only clear disease entity is:

1. B-cell non-Hodgkins lymphomas (B-NHL)

The other entity, "a B-NHL cell line," is not a disease itself, but rather a type of cell line derived from a disease. Therefore, it does not clearly refer to a disease and is not included in the table.
